pages.heading: Dexterity Alkahest
pages.text: Lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 33%. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (256 shots)

pages.heading: Dexterity Alkahest L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands I (1024 shots)

pages.heading: Dexterity Alkahest II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lowers the draw time of bows and crossbows by 50%. $(br2)Applies: Deft Hands II (256 shots)
